newsitem.title: USA: US Diagnostic elects Joseph Paul CEO.
newsitem.headline: US Diagnostic elects Joseph Paul CEO.

text.p: US Diagnostic Inc said it named its president, Joseph Paul, as chief executive officer, replacing Jeffrey Goffman.
Goffman and Michael Karsch, executive vice-president, general counsel and secretary, were no longer employed by the company, US Diagnostic said in a statement on Monday.
Goffman and Karsch had been on administrative leave from the company since February 1, 1997, the company said. Paul had been serving as interim CEO since that time, it said.
Laurans Mendelson would continue as chairman of board, it said.
US Diagnostic also said it expected to add a new chief operating officer and general counsel.
It expected to expand the board to include two new, experienced outside directors as well.
